author: Fextralife
description:
Titan Quest 2 Gameplay, Roadmap and Patch - Can it Succeed??
https://titanquest2.wiki.fextralife.com/Titan+Quest+2+Wiki
In this Titan Quest 2 video, I want to talk a little bit about whether Titan Quest 2 can go the distance and leave its mark in the ARPG space. Its kind of a classic ARPG compared to more modern ones like Last Epoch and Path of Exile 2. So we're going to get into that in this video. We're also going to talk about the hotfix that just happened the other day, as well as the roadmap that THQ Nordic posted about the game.

0:00 - Titan Quest 2 Early Access Hotfix and Roadmap
0:23 - Hotfixes
1:30 - Major Updates
1:57 - Roadmap
3:36 - FAQ
8:14 - My Thoughts

Don't forget to like the video and subscribe to our channel for more!

title: Titan Quest 2 Gameplay, Roadmap and Patch - Can it Succeed??
